all_questions.question: How do you rank sentences when they have different levels of badness at different places?
What approach did researchers take to evaluate the whole document, given that direct comparison between two documents is not possible?
all_questions.context: The same sentence in a different context

all_questions.question: Why were sentences deemed too long for comparison?
How did the approach of relative ranking of just a part of a sentence compare to evaluating the whole sentence?
What simplification did annotators receive by assessing only highlighted phrases in the given document?
